definitions.definition: Of or relating to the process of selection .
Of or relating to natural selection .
Choosy , fussy or discriminating when selecting.
examples: He's very selective and spent hours in the store choosing a new shirt.

definitions.definition: Having the authority or capability to make a selection.
examples: In the USA, military conscription is controlled by the Selective Service.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to the social work approach called selectivity .

main_definition: Of or relating to the process of selection .
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) Of or relating to natural selection .
( of a person ) Choosy , fussy or discriminating when selecting.
( chiefly US , not comparable ) Having the authority or capability to make a selection.
Of or relating to the social work approach called selectivity .
